page.title: 13MARCONI UNDERWATER SYSTEMS
page.content: After initial problems with a "Peace Camp" which objected to the building of a factory involved in the manufacture of armaments the buildings on the site were completed in April 1985 and covers about 13 acres. They employ about 1200 men and 300 women and,because of their specialists trades(electrical engineering) were not recruited locally but brought in to the area. The skills required in the engineering field accounts for the fact that more men are employed than women. Marconi's do not actually manufacture anything they are purely a research and development "Think Tank". Leisure facilities include a dance and disco hall, table tennis,judo and keep fit areas as well as a bar. An underground stream runs through the site which limits the size and weight of vehicles which can enter the site.
